resources.string: How did you feel in the last two hours???
Some answers are missing. Please check and retry.
We have a question for you...
Please help us answering these easy questions...
Complete our questionnaire about your day!
During the day you marked some hours as stressed. If you were stressed during only a part of the time interval, could you specify it here?
With this questionnaire, we ask you to be more precise to mark time interval of the day when you were stressed.
What you can see listed are all the time interavals of the day that you marked as stressed. Clicking on the different times, it is possible to correct them and make it more adherent to the reality.
Once finished, just click on "Confirm!" and everything will be saved.
Screenshot of the questionnaire provided to the participant
What do we want to know?
With this question, we ask you your psychological state among your last two hours.
Yes, Energy, Valence and Stress is what we would like to know.
Energy: how much active you feel, 1 (not active) 5 (too active)
Valence: how good are your feelings: 1 (negative feelings) 5 (positive feelings)
Stress: how much stressed you feel: 1 (not stressed) 5 (very stressed)
